pullRequest.title: NMS-12538: add /ipinterfaces and /snmpinterfaces endpoints
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds (read-only) /ipinterfaces and /snmpinterfaces endpoints under ReSTv2. (this is a rework of a previous PR after rearranging some things project-wise)

JIRA (Issue Tracker): http://issues.opennms.org/browse/ULU-62
Bamboo (Continuous Integration): https://bamboo.opennms.org/

commit.message: NMS-12538: fix feedback, also fix search properties for cross-reference
